Row.Text: Fix me deadlights, matey. We aim for plunder and profit, and give naught to king nor God.
Hark ye to the Admiral of the Black, the scourge of the seven seas - Edward Teach, Blackbeard in the flesh.
Hark ye to the Admiral of the Black, the scourge of the seven seas - Edward Teach, Blackbeard in the flesh.
Hark ye to the Admiral of the Black, the scourge of the seven seas - Edward Teach, Blackbeard in the flesh.
Bring a spring on her cable, hearties! There's blood to be had.
Damnation seize my soul if I give you quarter or take any from ye!
Aye, ye've sunk me. 'Tween the Devil and Davey Jones, there's thee.
